nodes.text: The Scillal system was located in the Centrality sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The Cadma Conduit hyperlane connected it to the Erilnar and Lekua systems.

The Scillal system contained shipyards that were the largest starship manufacturing facility of the Centrality. The company Scillal Designs was headquartered in the system, and although the shipyards were far smaller than the facilities located in the orbit of the Core Worlds planet Corellia, they were adequate for most of the warship requests made by the Centrality Navy. As a result, the Scillal system became a hotspot for terrorist activity.

The Scillal system was first mentioned in the article "A Campaign Guide to the Centrality," which was authored by Michael Kogge and was published in Star Wars Gamer 5 on July 24, 2001. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square T-8.
